verses.verse: It happened in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the twelfth month, <S%H2320><s%> in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take up <S%H5375><s%> a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> over Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H1819><s%> You were likened to a young lion <S%H3715><s%> of the nations: <S%H1471><s%> yet you are as a monster <S%H8577><s%> in the seas; <S%H3220><s%> and you broke out <S%H1518><s%> with your rivers, <S%H5104><s%> and troubled <S%H1804><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> with your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and fouled <S%H7515><s%> their rivers. <S%H5104><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> I will spread out <S%H6566><s%> my net <S%H7568><s%> on you with a company <S%H6951><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples; <S%H5971><s%> and they shall bring you up <S%H5927><s%> in my net. <S%H2764><s%>

I will leave <S%H5203><s%> you on the land, <S%H776><s%> I will cast you forth <S%H2904><s%> on the open <S%H6440><s%> field, <S%H7704><s%> and will cause all the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> to settle <S%H7931><s%> on you, <S%H7646><s%> and I will satisfy the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the whole earth with you. <S%H776><s%>
I will lay <S%H5414><s%> your flesh <S%H1320><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the valleys <S%H1516><s%> with your height. <S%H7419><s%>

I will also water <S%H8248><s%> with your blood <S%H1818><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> in which you swim, <S%H6824><s%> even to the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> and the watercourses <S%H650><s%> shall be full of you. <S%H4390><s%>

When I shall extinguish <S%H3518><s%> you, <S%H3680><s%> I will cover the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and make <S%H6937><s%> its stars <S%H3556><s%> dark; <S%H6937><s%> I will cover <S%H3680><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> with a cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> shall not give <S%H215><s%> its light. <S%H216><s%>

All the bright <S%H3974><s%> lights <S%H216><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> will I make dark <S%H6937><s%> over you, <S%H5414><s%> and set darkness <S%H2822><s%> on your land, <S%H776><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

I will also trouble <S%H3707><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> when I shall bring <S%H935><s%> your destruction <S%H7667><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> into the countries <S%H776><s%> which you have not known. <S%H3045><s%>

Yes, <S%H7227><s%> I will make many peoples <S%H5971><s%> amazed <S%H8074><s%> at you, <S%H4428><s%> and their kings shall be horribly <S%H8178><s%> afraid <S%H8175><s%> for you, <S%H5774><s%> when I shall brandish my sword <S%H2719><s%> before them; <S%H6440><s%> and they shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> at every moment, <S%H7281><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> for his own life, <S%H5315><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your fall. <S%H4658><s%>
For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> The sword <S%H2719><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall come on you. <S%H935><s%>

By the swords <S%H2719><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> will I cause your multitude <S%H1995><s%> to fall; <S%H5307><s%> the terrible <S%H6184><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> are they all: <S%H7703><s%> and they shall bring to nothing the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and all its multitude <S%H1995><s%> shall be destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

I will destroy <S%H6><s%> also all its animals <S%H929><s%> from <S%H5921><s%> beside many <S%H7227><s%> waters; <S%H4325><s%> neither shall the foot <S%H7272><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> trouble <S%H1804><s%> them any more, <S%H6541><s%> nor the hoofs of animals <S%H929><s%> trouble them. <S%H1804><s%>

Then will I make their waters <S%H4325><s%> clear, <S%H8257><s%> and cause their rivers <S%H5104><s%> to run <S%H3212><s%> like oil, <S%H8081><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

When I shall make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%> and waste, <S%H776><s%> a land destitute <S%H8074><s%> of that of which it was full, <S%H4393><s%> when I shall strike <S%H5221><s%> all those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein, <S%H3045><s%> then shall they know that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

This is the lamentation <S%H7015><s%> with which they shall lament; <S%H6969><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall lament <S%H6969><s%> therewith; <S%H4714><s%> over Egypt, and over all her multitude, <S%H1995><s%> shall they lament <S%H6969><s%> therewith, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

It happened also in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> wail <S%H5091><s%> for the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and cast them down, <S%H3381><s%> even her, <S%H1323><s%> and the daughters of the famous <S%H117><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> to the lower parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> with those who go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit. <S%H953><s%>
Whom do you pass in beauty? <S%H5276><s%> Go down, <S%H3381><s%> and be laid <S%H7901><s%> with the uncircumcised. <S%H6189><s%>

They shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of those who are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%> she is delivered <S%H5414><s%> to the sword; <S%H2719><s%> draw <S%H4900><s%> her away and all her multitudes. <S%H1995><s%>

The strong <S%H410><s%> among the mighty <S%H1368><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to him out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Sheol <S%H7585><s%> with those who help <S%H5826><s%> him: <S%H3381><s%> they are gone down, they lie <S%H7901><s%> still, <S%H6189><s%> even the uncircumcised, slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Asshur <S%H804><s%> is there and all her company; <S%H6951><s%> her graves <S%H6913><s%> are all around <S%H5439><s%> her; <S%H2491><s%> all of them slain, fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%>

whose graves <S%H6913><s%> are set <S%H5414><s%> in the uttermost <S%H3411><s%> parts of the pit, <S%H953><s%> and her company <S%H6951><s%> is around <S%H5439><s%> her grave; <S%H6900><s%> all of them slain, <S%H2491><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> who caused <S%H5414><s%> terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>

There is Elam <S%H5867><s%> and all her multitude <S%H1995><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> her grave; <S%H6900><s%> all of them slain, <S%H2491><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> who are gone down <S%H3381><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> into the lower parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> who caused <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living, <S%H2416><s%> and have borne <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> with those who go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

They have set <S%H5414><s%> her a bed <S%H4904><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the slain <S%H2491><s%> with all her multitude; <S%H1995><s%> her graves <S%H6913><s%> are around <S%H5439><s%> her; <S%H6189><s%> all of them uncircumcised, slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> for their terror <S%H2851><s%> was caused <S%H5414><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living, <S%H2416><s%> and they have borne <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> with those who go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit: <S%H953><s%> he is put <S%H5414><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of those who are slain. <S%H2491><s%>

There is Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> Tubal, <S%H8422><s%> and all their multitude; <S%H1995><s%> their graves <S%H6913><s%> are around <S%H5439><s%> them; <S%H6189><s%> all of them uncircumcised, slain <S%H2490><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> for they caused <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>

They shall not lie <S%H7901><s%> with the mighty <S%H1368><s%> who are fallen <S%H5307><s%> of the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> who are gone down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> with their weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> and have laid <S%H5414><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> under their heads, <S%H7218><s%> and their iniquities <S%H5771><s%> are on their bones; <S%H6106><s%> for they were the terror <S%H2851><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
But you shall be broken <S%H7665><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> and shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with those who are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

There is Edom, <S%H123><s%> her kings <S%H4428><s%> and all her princes, <S%H5387><s%> who in their might <S%H1369><s%> are laid <S%H5414><s%> with those who are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%> they shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> and with those who go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

There are the princes <S%H5257><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> all of them, <S%H6722><s%> and all the Sidonians, who are gone down <S%H3381><s%> with the slain; <S%H2491><s%> in the terror <S%H2851><s%> which they caused by their might <S%H1369><s%> they are put to shame; <S%H954><s%> and they lie <S%H7901><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> with those who are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and bear <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> with those who go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> them, <S%H5162><s%> and shall be comforted over all his multitude, <S%H1995><s%> even Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all his army, <S%H2428><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

For I have put <S%H5414><s%> his terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living; <S%H2416><s%> and he shall be laid <S%H7901><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> with those who are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> even Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all his multitude, <S%H1995><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
